title: "Testing"
author: "Michael A Barrowman"
date: "09/03/2020"
output: word_document
---

```{r, echo=F}
library(flextable)
library(tidyverse)
tibble(Name = c("Red","Blue","Yellow","Green","Blue-Green"),
       x=runif(5),y=runif(5)) %>%
  flextable %>%
  footnote(i=1,j=1,value=as_paragraph("Test"),ref_symbols = "a") %>%
  footnote(i=2,j=1,value=as_paragraph("Test2"),ref_symbols = "b") %>%
  fontsize(size=7,part="footer")
```


```{r, echo=F}
library(flextable)
tibble(Name = c("Red","Blue","Yellow","Green","Blue-Green"),
       x=runif(5),y=runif(5)) %>%
  flextable %>%
  footnote(i=1:2,j=1,value=as_paragraph(c("Test","Test2")),ref_symbols = c("a","b"))
 
```
